abstract: St John's College requires its instructors to teach almost every subject in classic curriculum, including those far outside one's field of specialty.
snippet: As academia fractures into ever more specific disciplines, St. John’s College requires its instructors to teach almost every subject in the classic curriculum.
lead_paragraph: As academia fractures into ever more specific disciplines, St. John’s College requires its instructors to teach almost every subject in the classic curriculum.

headline.main: Seeing Value in Ignorance, College Expects Its Physicists to Teach Poetry
headline.print_headline: Seeing Value in Ignorance, College Expects Its Physicists to Teach Poetry
headline.seo: St. John’s College Puts Emphasis on What Teachers Don’t Know
